season: Season 1 - Siege of the Azure Vale
theme: Hold the Azure Vale while decoding the Archivist's siege plan.

items.title: Calibrate Defenders
items.reward: Campaign unlocked with replay/skip controls in the main menu.
items.summary: Finish the tutorial steps to arm the ramparts before the invasion begins.

items.title: Wave 1: Scout Ambush
items.reward: Turret slot 3 unlocked; early regen preview in castle upgrades.
items.summary: Survive the scouts and bring the third turret slot online to widen coverage.

items.title: Raise the Banner
items.reward: Armor plating and regen bump to brace for shielded pushes.
items.summary: Spend the first haul on sturdier walls before the shielded assault arrives.

items.title: Shieldbreaker Offensive
items.milestone: Defeat the shielded brutes in Wave 2
items.reward: Shield analytics logged; slot 4 unlocked for flexible coverage.
items.summary: Lean on turret fire to pop shields while keeping combo windows alive.

items.title: Archivist Showdown
items.reward: Boss codex entry and slot 5 readiness for the finale.
items.summary: Close out the siege while capturing taunts, lore drops, and breach analytics.

items.title: Codex Dossier
items.reward: Codex feed available for HUD logs and QA dashboards.
items.summary: Collect episode notes to brief the next cohort of defenders.
